meanings.definition: The string of a bow, used to propel an arrow.

meanings.sent2: Make sure the bowstring is taut and in good condition before shooting.

meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a bowstring, ready to release a powerful note at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The sun glistened on the taught bowstring, highlighting its strength and purpose.
